text:
MYJAR | Multiple | Tallinn, Estonia | on-site | full-time

We're looking for talented node devs, angular 2 devs/lead, general devops (ansible, AWS, etc... several positions here)

We're a financial company looking to augment our IT staff as we, in tandem, innovate our backend and frontend tech stacks using angular2 and a microservices architecture on AWS (elastic beanstalk, lambda, rabbitmq).

We can offer relocation and visas for qualified candidates. The office is in Tallinn, Estonia. Fun work atmosphere, stocked fridge, massage therapist and many other little perks.

shoot me a message (details in profile) if you're interested.
